cards.name: Swipe In
cards.flavorText: Tap your MetroCard and keep moving!

cards.name: Fare Evasion
cards.effect: Cancel any action card played against you

cards.name: Power Broker
cards.effect: Steal a property from any player (not from a complete set)

cards.name: Service Change
cards.effect: Swap one of your properties with another player's property (not from complete sets)
cards.flavorText: Due to construction, your train has been rerouted.

cards.name: Line Closure
cards.effect: Steal a complete property set from any player (includes buildings)
cards.flavorText: This line is now out of service.

cards.name: Missed Your Train
cards.effect: Force any player to pay you $5M

cards.name: Rush Hour
cards.effect: Play with a rent card to double the rent amount

cards.name: Express Service
cards.effect: Add to a complete set to add $3M to rent (not on Railroads/Utilities)
cards.flavorText: This train is now running express.

cards.name: New Station
cards.effect: Add to a complete set with Express Service to add $4M to rent
cards.flavorText: The Second Avenue Subway is finally here!
